commonOperators

Class SinglePointCrossover

  • java.lang.Object
    • commonOperators.SinglePointCrossover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Crossover, TwoParentsCrossover

    public class SinglePointCrossover
extends java.lang.Object
implements TwoParentsCrossover
    Single point crossover NOTICES: CHROMOSOME HAS TO HAVE A CONSTRUCTOR THAT CONTAINS TWO GENE TYPE PARAMETERS
    Since:
    GA framework 1.0
    Author:
    Boxiong Tan (Maximus Tann)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public Chromosome[] update(Chromosome father,
                           Chromosome mother,
                           double crossoverRate)
        update the Global best according to all the personal bests Steps: 0. If a random number greater than crossover rate, return the same parents. 1. First get the sub-type of chromosome. 2. Get the constructor in which it allows two genes to be composed 3. Cut the chromosomes into pieces and reconstruct two children 4. return an array of children
        Specified by:
        update in interface TwoParentsCrossover
        Parameters:
        father - The selected chromosome that involved in crossover.
        mother - The selected chromosome that involved in crossover.
        crossoverRate - the probability of crossover.
        Returns:
        An array of chromosome children
